page.title: 07Sunday at Home-Stamford Br.
page.content: On sunday I get up,get dressed,go downstairs and have bacon and eggs. When I finish I ride around the estate.After that I watch a James Bond film or I play on a mud pile.I go back and have tea.Then I play on my synthesiser for a'pop'tape Michael and I are making. Then I read and go to bed.I like Doctor Who books. My mum cooks all the meals.My favourite food is cheese burger and chips.My dad's is cauliflower cheese and my mum particularly likes sausages. I have some chores to do each day.I have to tidy my room because it gets untidy . I have a pet cat called Angel.It is 14 years old and I like it very much.It sleeps in my bath,when of course,there is no water in it. By Guy Adams
